segments.text: May , could you bring this note to Professor Li for me today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , no problem . Asking for leave again ? You have been absent from class five times this semester .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . But attending Miss Li's class is just waste of time . No more than one third of her students will go to her class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree that Miss Li doesn't teach so well . Most students either sleep or do other things in her class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , my boyfriend plays the video game every time in class with me . Or I chat with my friends through text messages .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fortunately her class is just an elective course , not as important as compulsory courses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , so we must spare some time to attend selective courses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But isn't it too impolite to be absent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What can I do ? I have things to do in Students ' Government .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I thought you just gave an excuse on this note .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes I will try various excuses . But this is my last time asking for leave . Or I will have a bad record .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , besides , your credit will be deducted . That is kind of serious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been absented from many classes this semester just because of my work in the Students ' Government .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can't write with one hand and draw with the other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am thinking about quitting my job in the student government . But before that , I must do my job . Bye . Don't forget about that note .
segments.speaker: S1
